__e: Do you know where Norman is?
All right folks, looks like... Norman's hitting the trail, so we'll just get this Christmas party started without him!
I'm scared, Norman, and I can't listen to this any more.
Even I couldn't get to Norman and he knows me.
You know that we're in pursuit of Pierce Norman, and you would like to know what we've learned?
Your detective told you he couldn't come right back... because he was going to question Norman Bates' mother, right?
I think he got himself a hot lead as to where your sister was goin'... probably from Norman Bates... and called you to keep you still while he took off after her and the money.
What's your interest in Norman Shaw?
Norman Shaw says you had a long meeting with him the night of the 8th.
So why do we think it had something to do with Norman Shaw?
